# The `LineCoverageIterator` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

An iterator over the <code><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/coverage/linecoveragestats">LineCoverageStats</a></code> objects for lines described by a <code><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/coverage/coveragedata">CoverageData</a></code> instance. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

An iterator over the <code><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/coverage/linecoveragestats">LineCoverageStats</a></code> objects for lines described by a <code><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/coverage/coveragedata">CoverageData</a></code> instance.
